title: U.S. passenger-miles : Intercity/Amtrak 2007 to 2018
summary: In general U.S. passenger-miles in millions has stayed the same over the Year.
U.S. passenger-miles in millions is slightly decreasing from 2008 to 2009.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2008 and 2009.
Maximum U.S. passenger-miles in millions, about 6179.0 was reported at Year 2008
The lowest U.S. passenger-miles in millions, of value 5914.0 was reported at Year 2009
